alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 3:05PM AKST until November 30 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts may form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility are expected Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
